name: Bone Chilling Winds
description:
A wizard's attempts to create human-skeleton hybrids didn't go as planned. An army of skeletons threatens to take over the world using their dark skeletal magic if they aren't pushed back into their cages. However the wizard, in his old age, is too frail to fight off the sneaky skeletons and is unable to stop them. Only through controlling the forces of nature can he vanquish this big boned menace and ensure a future for calcium deficient people everywhere.

Use WASD to control the direction of the wind. Click on the ground to cause a lightning strike that will stun the skeletons for a few seconds.

Try to finish the level in 45 seconds!
